basics.name: Luong Tin Phan
basics.label: Robotics Engineer/Scientist
basics.summary: I am a robotics engineer/scientist with a passion for developing innovative solutions in the field of robotics. I have a strong background in robotics, software development, machine learning. My goal is to contribute to the advancement of robotics technology and its applications in various industries.

work.name: Next Robotics
work.summary: leading the team of 10 engineers and testers at Next Robotics to develop NextAMR products. I also work closely with the CEO to define the product lineups and ensure that the team is aligned with the company's business goals as well as working with the customers to understand their needs and provide the best solutions.

awards.title: Full Scholarship for a Ph.D Program
awards.summary: Awarded a full scholarship for the Ph.D program in Robotics at Sungkyunkwan University, covering tuition and living expenses.
